rooms.name: Living and Dining Area with Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: A spacious Mediterranean styled living area featuring an open-plan kitchen. Incorporates local building norms and Vastu principles by ensuring the entrance aligns with favorable directions.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Penthouse style master bedroom designed in Mediterranean aesthetics with an attached spacious balcony for morning sun and fresh air. The layout adheres to Vastu principles regarding the positioning of windows.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom with its own generous balcony for a joint family setting. Incorporates local design elements and ensures privacy while aligning with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater integrated into the living area. Features state-of-the-art acoustics and comfortable seating, designed to blend seamlessly with the Mediterranean theme.

openings.description: Separate balcony access from each bedroom ensures ventilation and natural light in accordance with Vastu.
